statement.text: A target FICO<sup>®</sup> Score 8 of 740 could be met within 3 months with the following actions:

actions.text: Pay down $5,270 of your total revolving/open account balances of $31,618 every month for 3 months.
Pay all your bills on time for 3 months.
Do not open any new accounts, so that the time since your most recently opened account ages to 10 months.
Do not open any new accounts, so that your average length of established history ages to 6 years, 8 months.
Do not apply for any new credit.
